trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PasswordBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PasswordBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PasswordBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PasswordBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
A string that contains "PasswordBox".
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PasswordBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value in the enumeration.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PasswordBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> contains protected content.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is read-only; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it can be modified.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The value of a control.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
A string value of the control.
